quotes.message: Nobody is stronger, nobody is weaker than someone who came back. There is nothing you can do to such a person because whatever you could do is less than what has already been done to him. We have already paid the price.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: In spite of everything that was done to me and my race, in spite of the adversity and the bitter moments, again we rise.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
quotes.name: Akiro Kurosawa

quotes.message: Peace is the one condition of survival in this nuclear age.
quotes.name: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.message: All I'm trying to do is not join my ancestral spirits just yet.
quotes.name: Joshua Nkomo

quotes.message: Hunger, love, pain, fear are some of those inner forces which rule the individual's instinct for self preservation.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf.
quotes.name: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.message: To survive it is often necessary to fight and to fight you have to dirty yourself.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: Once one determines that he or she has a mission in life, that's it's not going to be accomplished without a great deal of pain, and that the rewards in the end may not outweigh the pain --if you recognize historically that always happens, then when it comes, you survive it.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: Man can live about forty days without food, about three days without water, about eight minutes without air, but only for one second without hope.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Survival is nothing more than recovery.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: The ability to delude yourself may be an important survival tool.
quotes.name: Jane Wagner

quotes.message: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: In a world where change is inevitable and continuous, the need to achieve that change without violence is essential for survival.
quotes.name: Andrew Young

quotes.message: For Harmony. A chance at life. To fight on other days.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: The consciousness of being deemed dead, is next to the presumable unpleasantness of being so in reality. One feels like his own ghost unlawfully tenanting a defunct carcass.
quotes.name: Herman Melville

quotes.message: Nature's stern discipline enjoins mutual help at least as often as warfare. The fittest may also be the gentlest.
quotes.name: Theodosius Dobzhansky

quotes.message: The faster you can signal for rescue, the faster you get out of that situation.
quotes.name: Joseph Teti

quotes.message: You don't know if you're going to be rescued in a day or a month; gotta prepare for the long haul; gotta make the place your home.
quotes.name: Matt Graham

quotes.message: The man who goes afoot, prepared to camp anywhere and in any weather, is the most independent fellow on earth.
quotes.name: Horace Kephart

quotes.message: Perhaps catastrophe is the natural human environment, and even though we spend a good deal of energy trying to get away from it, we are programmed for survival amid catastrophe.
quotes.name: Germaine Greer

quotes.message: Tis the last rose of summer Left blooming alone; All her lovely companions Are faded and gone.
quotes.name: Thomas More

quotes.message: Every day I run scared. That's the only way I can stay ahead.
quotes.name: John H. Johnson

quotes.message: The condition of man... is a condition of war of everyone against everyone.
quotes.name: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.message: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but rather the one most adaptable to change.
quotes.name: Clarence Darrow

quotes.message: Resilience is the maintenance of high levels of positive affect and well-being in the face of adversity. It is not that resilient individuals never experience negative affect, but rather that the negative affect does not persist.
quotes.name: Richard J. Davidson

quotes.message: Self-preservation is the first principle of our nature.
quotes.name: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.message: In truth, we exist and survive, not because of the ego, but in spite of it.
quotes.name: David R. Hawkins

quotes.message: Only the strong survive.
quotes.name: Namibian Proverb

quotes.message: Rule of survival: Pack your own parachute.
quotes.name: T.L. Hakala

quotes.message: Victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory however long and hard the road may be; for without victory, there is no survival.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Survival is triumph enough.
quotes.name: Harry Crews

quotes.message: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Confront them with annihilation, and they will then survive; plunge them into a deadly situation, and they will then live. When people fall into danger, they are then able to strive for victory.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Every man is wise when attacked by a mad dog; fewer when pursued by a mad woman; only the wisest survive when attacked by a mad notion.
quotes.name: Robertson Davies

quotes.message: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Hunger, love, pain, fear are some of those inner forces which rule the individual's instinct for self preservation.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Self-preservation, nature's first great law, all the creatures, except man, doth awe.
quotes.name: Andrew Marvell

quotes.message: We are survival machines -- robot vehicles blindly programmed to preserve the selfish molecules known as genes.
quotes.name: Richard Dawkins

quotes.message: Survival is the ability to swim in strange water.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: Survival often feels like an indignity.
quotes.name: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.message: In the greater part of humankind there resides an instinct for survival. It is this which can clutch at straws and effect a rescue from them. It is this which can, now and then, outwit fate.
quotes.name: Tanith Lee

quotes.message: Survival ... is an infinite capacity for suspicion.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: What does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: There's a difference between surviving and living.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: I think that adaptation is the key to survival. Cooperation and symbiosis.
quotes.name: John Wyndham

quotes.message: Life is cruelty. We all feed on each other, exploit each other in some way to survive.
quotes.name: John Wyndham

quotes.message: Survival is not about certain death, it is about keeping your head down.
quotes.name: John Ridley

quotes.message: There is more to life than survival.
quotes.name: John Maclean

quotes.message: Surviving is not relevant. Living is. We want to live.
quotes.name: Gabe Ibáñez

quotes.message: The Pilgrims were born to help us in our heroic quest for survival. Now they build our homes, drive our cars, and wipe our asses when we get old. I have no idea what we're going to do next.
quotes.name: Gabe Ibáñez

quotes.message: Why does the Doctor always survive? Because he always assumes he's going to win. He always knows there's a way to survive. He just has to go and find it.
quotes.name: Steven Moffat

quotes.message: If the Earth dies, you die. If you die, the Earth survives. There are only a handful of planets in the cosmos that are capable of supporting complex life.
quotes.name: David Scarpa

quotes.message: Only the strong survive, you gotta be strong, you gotta hold on.
quotes.name: Chris Hegedus

quotes.message: In any disaster situation having a full tank of gas or access to gas is a dire emergency and can mean the difference between life and death in some cases.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Being able to travel to get help, food, water, and even medical treatment will enable you to be one step up on any disaster.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Regardless what the disaster situation brings you are going to need water. Water is essential in survival.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: The human body requires water to survive the amount however, depends on the body type and size of the person.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Everyone is going to be stressed after a collapse. As long as you're' willing to take at least part of your payments in alternative currencies, you might be able to make a good living thinking out the box.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: The ability to adapt to change will make your life easier, no matter what lies ahead.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: There are qualities that will make you more successful at changing, and they're qualities for which you might want to strive because if you're not in the right mental and emotional space, then preparing for potentially catastrophic change will be that much harder.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: The times we are living in now are the richest, fattest days in human history. Life will probably never get easier. This is when you need to start preparing right now for the hard times coming.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: Stockpiling, self-sufficiency, and frugality, which I prefer to call Spartaneity, are three tools that will help you survive and thrive.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: Survival is the continuation of life or existence in the presence of or despite unusually difficult conditions.
quotes.name: Rainer Stahlberg

quotes.message: In order to survive after the fall of civilized society you will have to roam about in order to locate whatever your specific necessities of life may be, and at some point you may be forced to raid in order to actually obtain them. By definition, now, that makes you a Marauder.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: In order to survive the fall of civilization, it will do you no good to be a hoarder, or a Prepper.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: Prepping is not the answer. Sure, you need to have some supplies on hand to get going, but the only real way to keep living, and thriving, is by looking for what you need and then taking it.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: There's only one way to survive. Go out and do it first.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: If you live on a farm, or way out in the country and are supplied by water from your own well, congratulations. You survive the first few weeks.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: An important benefit to learning survival skills is it increases your self-confidence.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: Having the ability to not just think but know you have what it takes to survive can make the difference between a news story featuring your survival over incredible odds vs becoming just another tragic statistic.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: What does it mean to improvise in a survival scenario? Simply put, it is using what you have to get what you need.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: No matter how hard you prep, how much money you spend, and how many hours you invest, the disaster always calls the shots.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: With a little resourcefulness and an 'outside of the survival box' mentality, you can oftentimes use what you do have to get what you need.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: Disease outbreaks, global wars, environmental catastrophes, nuclear disasters, and colonization are all apocalyptic events that humanity has survived.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Looking to past events should give us hope, because human beings can and do survive events like those that are unfolding.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Catastrophe is the natural human environment, and even though we spend a good deal of energy trying to get away from it, we are programmed for survival amid catastrophe.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Animal life is an important and substantial source of food for survival.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: A person thrown into a primitive survival situation would quickly find his existence greatly impaired without the aid of so simple a tool as a pocketknife.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: It would seem that one could never survive without a knife to cut poles for building shelters, to cut shafts for a spear or bow.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: It is asserted from time that true survival is measured by a person's capacity to stay put and prepared.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: In survival terms we might say that comfort only gets in the way.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: Probably the most important decision you'll make in your preparations for a crisis is the location of your retreat.
quotes.name: James Wesley

quotes.message: No. I can survive well enough on my own— if given the proper reading material.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.message: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson
